hadiths.text: Narrated Thabit bin Adh-Dahhak:That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Whoever swears by a religion other than Islam while lying, then he is as he said

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الْحَلِفِ بِغَيْرِ مِلَّةِ الإِسْلاَمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked To Swear By A Religion Other Than Islam
